title: How to Download Photos from an Instagram User with Instagram Downloader

steps.headline: Firstly you need to install a software named InstagramDownloader (v1.0) .To download the software go here [1] and click the green color download button to download the software.
The file will get downloaded in the form of a rar file.
steps.description: Extract the rar file. Inside you'll find the program called InstagramDownloader.

steps.headline: Double click the program to start it.
steps.description: Leave the program running in the background.

steps.headline: Now open Instagram and login into your Instagram account with your user ID and password.
Search a favorite user whose photos you would like to download and copy their user name.
Now go back to the InstagramDownloader software and paste the name in the first blank bar and click download.
steps.description:
The InstagramDownloader software will download all the links to the photos which are uploaded by the user however these will only include the ones which are public and not private. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5e\/Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/5e\/Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":337,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":556.4958677685951,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Now go to the The InstagramDownloader software's folder.
steps.description: You'll find a text file named by the user's name whose photos links you just downloaded.Open the text file. The text file contains the links to photos uploaded by your searched user.

steps.headline: Now copy one of the links and paste it in your browser.The image will appear on the screen.
steps.description: Right click on the image and press save image as.. to download the image.Similarly do for other image links and download the ones which are your favorites. You just downloaded your favorite Instagram photos from its uploader. This manual process is quite lengthy as you have to download each and every photo individually. However you might find it fun to view those images in your browser and enjoy as you scan photos for your favorite photos.

steps.headline: In this method you need to download a software named Free Instagram Downloader 2.3.0 .To download the software go here [2].Click the green color download tab to download the software.
Double click the installer to start installing the software.
steps.description: Finish the software installation by following the installation instructions.

steps.headline: Open the Instagram Downloader software.
steps.description: Click on Input User Name on the top or simply click the active statement in the middle of the screen.

steps.headline: Upon clicking a input window will appear, Enter the user name of Instagram user (from whom you want to download the photos) in it and press 'OK'.
The software will start downloading the photo's list.
steps.description: Wait for some time for the download process to get over.

steps.headline: Now here is the best part, here you can see the images unlike in manual method.
steps.description: Scan for your favorite images by ticking them and unticking the one's which you don't want to download.

steps.headline: Here in this method we have several ways in which we can download an image.
steps.description: One would be to download all images by clicking Download all button on the top toolbar.Other would be to download all the selected one's by clicking Download Selected Photos button on the top toolbar.Another would be to download individually by clicking the download links for the respective photos.

steps.headline: After you decide on the option, just click the chosen option and choose the location where you want to download the photos.
Leave the download process for some time until it finishes.On finishing you will receive a done!
You just downloaded a bunch of Instagram photos.
steps.description: This method is easy, fast and dynamic when compared to manual method.

text:
Manual Method Firstly you need to install a software named InstagramDownloader (v1.0) .To download the software go here [1] and click the green color download button to download the software. The file will get downloaded in the form of a rar file. Extract the rar file. Inside you'll find the program called InstagramDownloader. Double click the program to start it. Leave the program running in the background. Now open Instagram and login into your Instagram account with your user ID and password. Search a favorite user whose photos you would like to download and copy their user name. Now go back to the InstagramDownloader software and paste the name in the first blank bar and click download. The InstagramDownloader software will download all the links to the photos which are uploaded by the user however these will only include the ones which are public and not private. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/5\/5e\/Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg\/v4-460px-Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/5\/5e\/Download-Photos-from-an-Instagram-User-with-Instagram-Downloader-Step-6Bullet1-Version-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":337,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":556.4958677685951,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"} Now go to the The InstagramDownloader software's folder. You'll find a text file named by the user's name whose photos links you just downloaded.Open the text file. The text file contains the links to photos uploaded by your searched user. Now copy one of the links and paste it in your browser.The image will appear on the screen. Right click on the image and press save image as.. to download the image.Similarly do for other image links and download the ones which are your favorites. You just downloaded your favorite Instagram photos from its uploader. This manual process is quite lengthy as you have to download each and every photo individually. However you might find it fun to view those images in your browser and enjoy as you scan photos for your favorite photos. Software Method In this method you need to download a software named Free Instagram Downloader 2.3.0 .To download the software go here [2].Click the green color download tab to download the software. Double click the installer to start installing the software. Finish the software installation by following the installation instructions. Open the Instagram Downloader software. Click on Input User Name on the top or simply click the active statement in the middle of the screen. Upon clicking a input window will appear, Enter the user name of Instagram user (from whom you want to download the photos) in it and press 'OK'. The software will start downloading the photo's list. Wait for some time for the download process to get over. Now here is the best part, here you can see the images unlike in manual method. Scan for your favorite images by ticking them and unticking the one's which you don't want to download. Here in this method we have several ways in which we can download an image. One would be to download all images by clicking Download all button on the top toolbar.Other would be to download all the selected one's by clicking Download Selected Photos button on the top toolbar.Another would be to download individually by clicking the download links for the respective photos. After you decide on the option, just click the chosen option and choose the location where you want to download the photos. Leave the download process for some time until it finishes.On finishing you will receive a done! notification. You just downloaded a bunch of Instagram photos. This method is easy, fast and dynamic when compared to manual method.
